verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Al-tashheth. A Psalm of Asaph, a Song. We give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee <S%H430><s%>, O God; We give thanks <S%H3034><s%>, for thy name <S%H8034><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%>: Men tell <S%H5608><s%> of thy wondrous works <S%H6381><s%>.
When I shall find <S%H3947><s%> the set <S%H4150><s%> time <S%H8199><s%>, I will judge uprightly <S%H4339><s%>.
The earth <S%H776><s%> and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof are dissolved <S%H4127><s%>: I have set up <S%H8505><s%> the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of it <S%H5542><s%>. [[Selah
I said <S%H559><s%> unto the arrogant <S%H1984><s%>, Deal not arrogantly <S%H1984><s%>; And to the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Lift not up <S%H7311><s%> the horn <S%H7161><s%>:
Lift not up <S%H7311><s%> your horn <S%H7161><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>; Speak <S%H1696><s%> not with a stiff <S%H6277><s%> neck <S%H6677><s%>.
For neither from the east <S%H4161><s%>, nor from the west <S%H4628><s%>, Nor yet from the south <S%H4057><s%>, cometh lifting up <S%H7311><s%>.
But God <S%H430><s%> is the judge <S%H8199><s%>: He putteth down <S%H8213><s%> one <S%H7311><s%>, and lifteth up another.

For in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> there is a cup <S%H3563><s%>, and the wine <S%H3196><s%> foameth <S%H2560><s%>; It is full <S%H4392><s%> of mixture <S%H4538><s%>, and he poureth out <S%H5064><s%> of the same <S%H2088><s%>: Surely the dregs <S%H8105><s%> thereof <S%H7563><s%>, all the wicked of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall drain <S%H4680><s%> them <S%H8354><s%>, and drink them.
But I will declare <S%H5046><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
All the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> also will I cut off <S%H1438><s%>; But the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be lifted up <S%H7311><s%>.
